law.text:
A refund payable to a qualified business entity under § 6-403(f) or § 6-404(d) of this subtitle reduces:
the income tax revenue from corporations if the qualified business entity is a corporation subject to the income tax under Title 10 of the Tax - General Article;
the income tax revenue from individuals if the qualified business entity is:
an individual subject to the income tax under Title 10 of the Tax - General Article; or
an organization exempt from taxation under § 501(c)(3) or (4) of the Internal Revenue Code; and
insurance premium tax revenues if the qualified business entity is subject to taxation under Title 6 of the Insurance Article.
